sql.remarks: main query hcsa licence and application

sqls.sql:
SELECT distinct mainView.LIC_APP_KEY_ID, mainView.APPLICATION_ID, mainView.application_no, mainView.app_type, mainView.appStatus app_status, mainView.APP_SVC_NAME, mainView.ADDRESS, mainView.LIC_ADDRESS, mainView.LICENCE_ID, mainView.licence_no, mainView.svc_name, mainView.LicSTATUS, mainView.start_date, mainView.expiry_date, mainView.app_licensee_id_no, mainView.lic_licensee_id_no, mainView.APP_BUSINESS_NAME, mainView.LIC_BUSINESS_NAME, mainView.APP_PREM_TYPE, mainView.LIC_PREM_TYPE, mainView.APP_LICENSEE_NAME, mainView.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME, mainView.app_licensee_id, mainView.lic_licensee_id,mainView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE
FROM LIC_APP_MAIN_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW mainView WHERE 1=1 <#if getLicenceNo??>AND mainView.licence_no LIKE CONCAT('%', (:getLicenceNo),'%')</#if> <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , mainView.application_no )>0</#if> <#if getLicenceStatus??> AND mainView.LicSTATUS = :getLicenceStatus</#if> <#if getLicenseeIdNo??> AND (charindex(:getLicenseeIdNo , mainView.app_licensee_id_no )>0 or charindex(:getLicenseeIdNo , mainView.lic_licensee_id_no )>0)</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND (charindex(:getBusinessName , mainView.APP_BUSINESS_NAME )>0 or charindex(:getBusinessName , mainView.LIC_BUSINESS_NAME )>0)</#if> <#if getLicenseeName??> AND (charindex(:getLicenseeName , mainView.APP_LICENSEE_NAME )>0 or charindex(:getLicenseeName , mainView.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME )>0)</#if> <#if getInspectionDateFrom??> AND mainView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE >= convert(date,:getInspectionDateFrom)</#if> <#if getInspectionDateTo??> AND mainView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE <= convert(datetime,:getInspectionDateTo)</#if>

SELECT distinct payView.APP_ID, payView.APPLICATION_NO, payView.APP_TYPE_STR, payView.BUSINESS_NAME, payView.SVC_NAME, payView.PREM_TYPE, payView.ADDRESS, payView.PMT_STATUS_STR, payView.SUBMIT_DT, payView.AMOUNT, payView.PAYMENT_DT, payView.PAY_METHOD_STR FROM PAYMENT_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW payView WHERE 1=1 <#if getLicenceNo??>AND payView.LICENCE_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',(:getLicenceNo),'%') </#if> <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , payView.APPLICATION_NO )>0</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , payView.BUSINESS_NAME )>0 </#if> <#if getServiceNameList??> AND payView.SVC_NAME in( :getServiceNameList)</#if> <#if getApplicationType??>AND :getApplicationType = payView.APP_TYPE </#if> <#if getApplicationDateFrom??> AND payView.SUBMIT_DT >= convert(date,:getApplicationDateFrom)</#if> <#if getApplicationDateTo??> AND payView.SUBMIT_DT <= convert(datetime,:getApplicationDateTo)</#if> <#if getPaymentStatus??> AND payView.PMT_STATUS = :getPaymentStatus</#if> <#if getPaymentMode??> AND payView.PAY_METHOD = :getPaymentMode</#if>

SELECT distinct lqrv.LICENCE_ID, lqrv.LICENCE_NO, lqrv.SVC_NAME, lqrv.START_DATE, lqrv.EXPIRY_DATE, lqrv.BUSINESS_NAME, lqrv.PREMISES_TYPE, lqrv.POSTAL_CODE, lqrv.STREET_NAME, lqrv.LicSTATUS,lqrv.LicSTATUS_STR, lqrv.LICENSEE_NAME, lqrv.LICENSEE_ID_NO, lqrv.CATEGORY, lqrv.VEHICLE_NUM, lqrv.DICIPLINE_SS, lqrv.ADDRESS, lqrv.LAST_INSP_START_DATE FROM LICENCE_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW lqrv WHERE 1=1 <#if getLicenceNo??>AND lqrv.LICENCE_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',(:getLicenceNo),'%') </#if> <#if getStreetName??> AND charindex(:getStreetName , lqrv.STREET_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getLicenceStatus??> AND lqrv.LicSTATUS = :getLicenceStatus</#if> <#if getLicenseeIdNo??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeIdNo , lqrv.LICENSEE_ID_NO )>0</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , lqrv.BUSINESS_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getLicenseeName??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeName , lqrv.LICENSEE_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getMosdType??> AND lqrv.PREMISES_TYPE = :getMosdType</#if> <#if getPostalCode??>AND :getPostalCode = lqrv.POSTAL_CODE </#if> <#if getVehicleNo??> AND charindex(:getVehicleNo , lqrv.VEHICLE_NUM )>0</#if> <#if getServiceName??>AND lqrv.SVC_NAME in ( :getServiceName)</#if> <#if licenceIds??>AND lqrv.LICENCE_ID in (:licenceIds)</#if> <#if getLicenseeId??>AND :getLicenseeId = lqrv.SUB_LICENSEE_ID </#if>

SELECT lqrv.LICENSEE_ID, lqrv.LICENSEE_TYPE,lqrv.LICENSEE_TYPE_STR, lqrv.ID_NUMBER, lqrv.EMAIL_ADDR, lqrv.LICENSEE_NAME, lqrv.organisation_name, lqrv.PHONE_NO, lqrv.OFFICE_NO, lqrv.ADDRESS FROM LICENSEE_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW lqrv WHERE 1=1 <#if getLicenseeType??> AND lqrv.LICENSEE_TYPE = :getLicenseeType</#if> <#if getLicenseeIdNo??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeIdNo , lqrv.ID_NUMBER )>0</#if> <#if getOrganisationName??> AND charindex(:getOrganisationName , lqrv.organisation_name )>0</#if> <#if getLicenseeName??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeName , lqrv.LICENSEE_NAME )>0</#if>

SELECT distinct aqrv.APP_ID, aqrv.APPLICATION_NO, aqrv.APP_TYPE_STR, aqrv.LICENSEE_NAME, aqrv.ID_NUMBER, aqrv.BUSINESS_NAME, aqrv.SUBMIT_DT, aqrv.SUBMIT_BY, aqrv.AUTO_APPROVE, aqrv.DISPLAY_NAME, aqrv.SVC_NAME, aqrv.PREM_TYPE, aqrv.APP_STATUS_STR, aqrv.PMT_STATUS_STR, aqrv.VEHICLE_NUM, aqrv.ADDRESS
FROM APPLICATION_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW aqrv WHERE 1=1 <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , aqrv.APPLICATION_NO )>0</#if> <#if appStatusAll??> AND ${appStatusAll}</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , aqrv.BUSINESS_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getVehicleNo??> AND charindex(:getVehicleNo , aqrv.VEHICLE_NUM )>0</#if> <#if getApplicationType??>AND :getApplicationType = aqrv.APP_TYPE </#if> <#if getPostalCode??>AND :getPostalCode = aqrv.POSTAL_CODE </#if> <#if getStreetName??> AND charindex(:getStreetName , aqrv.STREET_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getLicenseeIdNo??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeIdNo , aqrv.ID_NUMBER )>0</#if> <#if getLicenseeName??> AND charindex(:getLicenseeName , aqrv.LICENSEE_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getAssignedOfficer??>AND :getAssignedOfficer = aqrv.DISPLAY_NAME </#if> <#if getAutoApproved??>AND :getAutoApproved = aqrv.AUTO_APPROVE </#if>

SELECT insView.ID, insView.APPLICATION_NO, insView.SVC_NAME, insView.DICIPLINE_SS, insView.APP_TYPE_STR, insView.BUSINESS_NAME, insView.VEHICLE_NUM, insView.PREM_TYPE, insView.ADDRESS, insView.AUTO_APPROVE, insView.LICENSEE_NAME, insView.ID_NUMBER, insView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE, insView.APP_STATUS_STR, insView.LAST_RISK_LEVEL_STR, insView.AUDIT_TYPE_STR, insView.INSP_NAME, insView.COMPLIANCE, insView.TCU_DATE, insView.NC_NUM
FROM INSPECTION_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW insView WHERE 1=1 <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , insView.APPLICATION_NO )>0</#if> <#if getApplicationType??>AND :getApplicationType = insView.APP_TYPE </#if> <#if getInspectionType??>AND :getInspectionType = insView.PREM_TYPE </#if> <#if getMosdType??> AND insView.PREM_TYPE = :getMosdType</#if> <#if getServiceName??>AND insView.SVC_NAME = :getServiceName</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , insView.BUSINESS_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getInspectionDateFrom??> AND insView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE >= convert(date,:getInspectionDateFrom)</#if> <#if getInspectionDateTo??> AND insView.LAST_INSP_START_DATE <= convert(datetime,:getInspectionDateTo)</#if> <#if getAuditType??> AND insView.AUDIT_TYPE = :getAuditType</#if> <#if isTCU1??> AND :isTCU1 = 1 and insView.TCU_DATE is not null</#if> <#if isTCU0??> AND :isTCU0 = 0 and insView.TCU_DATE is null</#if>

sql.remarks: query hcsa licence for application tab

sqls.sql: SELECT distinct atqrv.APP_ID, atqrv.APPLICATION_NO, atqrv.APP_TYPE,atqrv.APP_TYPE_STR, atqrv.BUSINESS_NAME, atqrv.SUBMIT_DT, atqrv.SUBMIT_BY, atqrv.AUTO_APPROVE, atqrv.APP_STATUS,atqrv.APP_STATUS_STR, atqrv.DISPLAY_NAME, atqrv.PMT_STATUS,atqrv.PMT_STATUS_STR, atqrv.VEHICLE_NUM FROM APPLICATION_TAB_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW atqrv WHERE 1=1 <#if licenceId??>AND (:licenceId = atqrv.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID or :licenceId = atqrv.LICENCE_ID) </#if> <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , atqrv.APPLICATION_NO )>0</#if> <#if appStatusAll??> AND ${appStatusAll}</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , atqrv.BUSINESS_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getVehicleNo??> AND charindex(:getVehicleNo , atqrv.VEHICLE_NUM )>0</#if>

sql.remarks: query hcsa licence for adHoc Rfi Tab

sqls.sql:
SELECT distinct rfiTab.RFI_ID, rfiTab.REQUEST_DATE, rfiTab.DUE_DATE_SUBMISSION, rfiTab.LICENCE_NO, rfiTab.REQUEST_USER, rfiTab.TITLE, rfiTab.REPLY_DATE, rfiTab.STATUS
FROM ADHOC_RFI_TAB_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW rfiTab WHERE 1=1 <#if licenceId??>AND :licenceId = rfiTab.LIC_ID </#if> <#if getLicenceNo??> AND charindex(:getLicenceNo , rfiTab.LICENCE_NO )>0</#if> <#if getRequestedBy??>AND :getRequestedBy = rfiTab.REQUEST_USER </#if> <#if getDueDateFrom??> AND rfiTab.DUE_DATE_SUBMISSION >= convert(date,:getDueDateFrom)</#if> <#if getDueDateTo??> AND rfiTab.DUE_DATE_SUBMISSION <= convert(datetime,:getDueDateTo)</#if> <#if getRequestDateFrom??> AND rfiTab.REQUEST_DATE >= convert(date,:getRequestDateFrom)</#if> <#if getRequestDateTo??> AND rfiTab.REQUEST_DATE <= convert(datetime,:getRequestDateTo)</#if>

sql.remarks: query hcsa licence for Inspections Tab

sqls.sql:
SELECT distinct insTab.ID, insTab.APPLICATION_NO, insTab.APP_TYPE,insTab.APP_TYPE_STR, insTab.BUSINESS_NAME, insTab.APP_STATUS, insTab.APP_STATUS_STR, insTab.LAST_INSP_START_DATE, insTab.INSP_NAME, insTab.VEHICLE_NUM, insTab.INSPECTION_TYPE, insTab.COMPLIANCE, insTab.LAST_RISK_LEVEL, insTab.LAST_RISK_LEVEL_STR, insTab.AUDIT_TYPE,insTab.AUDIT_TYPE_STR, insTab.TCU_DATE, insTab.NC_NUM
FROM INSPECTION_TAB_QUERY_RESULT_VIEW insTab WHERE 1=1 <#if licenceId??>AND (:licenceId = insTab.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID or :licenceId = insTab.LICENCE_ID) </#if> <#if getApplicationNo??> AND charindex(:getApplicationNo , insTab.APPLICATION_NO )>0</#if> <#if appStatusAll??> AND ${appStatusAll}</#if> <#if getBusinessName??> AND charindex(:getBusinessName , insTab.BUSINESS_NAME )>0</#if> <#if getVehicleNo??> AND charindex(:getVehicleNo , insTab.VEHICLE_NUM )>0</#if> <#if getInspectionType??>AND charindex(:getInspectionType , insTab.INSPECTION_TYPE )>0 </#if> <#if getInspectionDateFrom??> AND insTab.LAST_INSP_START_DATE >= convert(date,:getInspectionDateFrom)</#if> <#if getInspectionDateTo??> AND insTab.LAST_INSP_START_DATE <= convert(datetime,:getInspectionDateTo)</#if> <#if appNo??>AND :appNo = insTab.APPLICATION_NO </#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T1.notification_id,T3.history_id,T1.notification_type,SUBSTRING(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL,1, LEN(RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) - 1) recipient,T1.sender,T1.subject,T1.content,T1.number_of_attempts, T2.file_name,T3.log_msg,T3.sent_time FROM notification T1 left JOIN notification_annex T2 ON T1.REQUEST_REF_NO = T2.request_ref_num left JOIN notification_history T3 ON T1.notification_id = T3.notification_id LEFT JOIN notification_recipient ON notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id CROSS APPLY ( SELECT notification_recipient.RECIPIENT_VALUE + ', ' FROM notification_recipient WHERE notification_recipient.notification_id = T1.notification_id FOR XML PATH('') ) D (RECIPIENT_VALUE_ALL) WHERE 1 = 1 <#if REQUEST_REF_NO??> and (T1.client_query_code =:REQUEST_REF_NO or T1.REQUEST_REF_NO =:REQUEST_REF_NO)</#if> <#if msgName??> AND charindex(:msgName, T1.subject) > 0 </#if>
